```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(purrr)
library(openxlsx)
library(tidyverse)
library(vegan)
```


```{r tidy_data}

(df <- as.data.frame(read.xlsx("16S_rarefied_table.xlsx")))

```


```{r phylum}

#Select the phylum column
df_phylum <- na.omit(df[,-c(1,3:7)])

#Calculate the number of reads per sample for each phylum
df_phylum_sorted <- pivot_longer(df_phylum, cols= B_2_1:R_9_3, names_to = "Samples", values_to = "Nb_reads") 
df_phylum_sorted <- group_by(df_phylum_sorted, Samples, Phylum) %>% 
  summarise(Nb_reads = sum(Nb_reads))

#Wide the table so that one sample has one line
df_phylum_sorted <- pivot_wider(df_phylum_sorted, names_from = Phylum, values_from = Nb_reads)

#export the dataset
write.xlsx(df_phylum_sorted,"16S_phylum_reads.xlsx")
```

```{r}
## BIODIVERSITY INDICATORS


# Phylum of 16S 

#Transpose the table

t_df_phylum_sorted <- data.frame(t(df_phylum_sorted[-1]))

# Shannon for Phylum of 16S

shann_phylum_16S <- diversity(t_df_phylum_sorted, index = "shannon", MARGIN = 1, base = exp(1))
write.csv(shann_phylum_16S, file = "shann_phylum_16S.csv", row.names = TRUE)

# Simpson for Phylum of 16S

simp_phylum_16S <- diversity(t_df_phylum_sorted, index = "simpson", MARGIN = 1, base = exp(1))
write.csv(simp_phylum_16S, file = "simp_phylum_16S.csv", row.names = TRUE)

# Chao1 for Phylum of 16S

chao_phylum_16S <- estimateR(t_df_phylum_sorted)
write.csv(chao_phylum_16S, file = "chao_phylum_16S.csv", row.names = TRUE)
```
